id: Answers From Orville Schell
locations: Today we have answers to your questions from Orville Schell, the author of nine books about China - including "Virtual Tibet," "Mandate of Heaven," "Discos and Democracy" and "To Get Rich Is Glorious." Earlier this month, Mr. Schell traveled to China and met with Chinese experts and officials to discuss global warming.

id: Answers From Orville Schell
locations: Today we have answers to your questions from Orville Schell, the author of nine books about China - including "Virtual Tibet," "Mandate of Heaven," "Discos and Democracy" and "To Get Rich Is Glorious." Earlier this month, Mr. Schell traveled to China and met with Chinese experts and officials to discuss global warming.
